about_the_game:
"

Devin Night Animated Token Pack 153: Goblins

Goblins, slippery, shifty, scampering creatures. Now you can bring them to life in your campaign with my animated pack of Goblin Fiends! These goblins will posture, sneer, and breath energy into your next encounter with such a familiar foe! Don’t wait, bring your goblin army to life today! Animated by YourToyRobot and optimized for play on FGU by Doug Davison. These 24 tokens are identical to the tokens in the Elite Goblins pack. Just animated. This pack includes:
  • F_goblin_Archer
  • F_goblin_Soldier
  • F_Hobgoblin_Archer
  • F_Hobgoblin_Soldier
  • F_RedWolf_Goblin.png
  • F_RedWolf_Hobgoblin
  • M_Bugbear_Fighter
  • M_goblin_Archer2
  • M_goblin_Archer
  • M_goblin_Chief2
  • M_goblin_Chief
  • M_goblin_Soldier1
  • M_goblin_Soldier2
  • M_goblin_Soldier3
  • M_goblin_SoldierSpear
  • M_Hobgoblin_Archer2
  • M_Hobgoblin_Archer
  • M_Hobgoblin_Soldier2
  • M_Hobgoblin_Soldier
  • M_RedWolf_Cutter
  • M_RedWolf_Goblin2
  • M_RedWolf_Goblin3
  • M_RedWolf_Goblin_Chief
  • RedWolf
"
detailed_description:
"

Devin Night Animated Token Pack 153: Goblins

Goblins, slippery, shifty, scampering creatures. Now you can bring them to life in your campaign with my animated pack of Goblin Fiends! These goblins will posture, sneer, and breath energy into your next encounter with such a familiar foe! Don’t wait, bring your goblin army to life today! Animated by YourToyRobot and optimized for play on FGU by Doug Davison. These 24 tokens are identical to the tokens in the Elite Goblins pack. Just animated. This pack includes:
  • F_goblin_Archer
  • F_goblin_Soldier
  • F_Hobgoblin_Archer
  • F_Hobgoblin_Soldier
  • F_RedWolf_Goblin.png

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.6.8 or newer
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: A sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: This product uses a wine wrapper to simplify installation
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10.6.8 or newer
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz processor or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0 compatible video adapter
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: A sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: This product uses a wine wrapper to simplify installation
